abstract: Stocks drop in wake of Federal Reserve's cautious assessment of global economy and its failure to indicate whether it will slow down planned increase on interest rates.

headline.print_headline: Market Declines After Fed Gives a Cautious Outlook
headline.main: Market Slides Back After Fed Announcement

snippet: Shares of Apple and Boeing were lower after their earnings reports disappointed investors.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Apple and Boeing were lower after their earnings reports disappointed investors.
